title: Episode 314 w/ A$AP Rocky
itunes:title: Episode 314 w/ A$AP Rocky
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode we chop it up with the one and only A$AP Rocky!

A$AP Rocky joins us as he shares his journey in hip-hop and the A$AP Mob. Rocky shares stories of JAY Z, Fabolous, his own whiskey “Mercer + Prince” and much much more! 

A$AP also talks about directing his own music videos, fashion, his relationship with Rihanna and the upcoming birth of their child! 

Lots of great stories that you don’t want to miss!!

Make some noise for A$AP Rocky!!! ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ†ğŸ†ğŸ†

 

Listen and subscribe at http://www.drinkchamps.com

N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode we chop it up with the one and only A$AP Rocky!

A$AP Rocky joins us as he shares his journey in hip-hop and the A$AP Mob. Rocky shares stories of JAY Z, Fabolous, his own whiskey “Mercer + Prince” and much much more! 

A$AP also talks about directing his own music videos, fashion, his relationship with Rihanna and the upcoming birth of their child! 

Lots of great stories that you don’t want to miss!!
